alert.note: Alert for Clay; Hall; Hamilton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:14PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Clay, southern Hamilton and southeastern Hall Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 614 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alda, or 8 miles southwest of Grand Island, moving east at 25 mph. Another strong thunderstorm is located in eastern Hamilton County and heading east at 25 mph as well. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Doniphan around 625 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Trumbull, Giltner and Stockham. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 302 and 340. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
